Sprouty dialogs is a dialogue system plugin for Godot 4.5+, that provide an easy-to-use, customizable and extensible way to create dialogues without having to build your own system.

The core features from this first release are:

  • Graph-based visual interface to create your dialogues in an easy and intuitive way
  • Text editor to write and format your dialogues easily using BBCode in a user-friendly way
  • Character editor to create and manage characters and portraits to use in your dialogues!
  • Variables support to condicional branching, parse variables and more!
  • Signals support to trigger events from your dialogues
  • Custom event nodes support to create you own events for your game
  • Translations support using .tres files or CSV files
  • Edit translations in the editor without leave the engine
  • And preview your dialogues directly in the editor!

You can find the release v1.0.0 here.
